entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 07:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 50 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
